We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

If your Fourth of July weekend is packed with fireworks and barbecues, then you should also arrange some time for shopping. After all, retailers are pulling out all the stops for the holiday, with savings up to 80% off. You can save on cookware, appliances, dining room sets, outdoor furniture, food, and more, from retailers like Le Creuset, Walmart, Wayfair … and the list goes on. So take a break from the sparklers and hot dogs and jump on these limited-time deals for your kitchen.

Top Kitchen Deals

Amazon — Amazon Prime Day is coming July 8, but you can start saving now. Cookware sets, folding table sets, and organizers, as well as grills, vacuum cleaners, and more are on sale. Check out this gadget we love on the site.

QVC — There are 1,000 of kitchen items on sale, from appliances to food. Check out the clearance section with deals up to 45% off. Use code WELCOME20 to score $20 off your first order. Here’s a deal that we think you should shop this weekend.

Wayfair — Wayfair is offering tons of savings on outdoor items, including furniture, decor, lighting, and more. Just in time for summer. See our top 11 outdoor picks.

Pottery Barn — With new deals up to 60% off and an extra 20% off sale and clearance, you’ll want to add all the sofas, curtains, rugs, chairs, beds, dining tables, mirrors, lamps, and more to your cart. We love this “Coastal Grandma” find.

All-Clad — Save up to $440 in the sale section when you shop the stainless steel cookware and high-quality gadgets and appliances our editors love.

Our Place — Save up to $148 on cookware bundles, including editor-favorite and internet-famous cookware, like the Always Pan and Perfect Pot. 

Williams Sonoma — Save up to 75% off clearance, 50% off Staub, 40% off Le Creuset, and more deals from top retailers. 

Le Creuset — This award-winning cookware brand is having a summer sale on cast-iron and stainless steel cookware, and, of course, Dutch ovens and cocottes. Check out our review of that iconic Dutch oven.

Anthropologie — Take up to 30% off Anthropologie’s outdoor furniture, plus deals on glassware, candles, decor, and more. You’ll find cute and versatile styles that fit every room of your home, like their chic new Parisian collection.

The Home Depot — You can save up to 40% on outdoor grills, refrigerators, patio furniture, air conditioners, tools, and so much more. 

Blackstone — Grab a 28-inch XL griddle, and you’ll get a complimentary 30-piece tool kit during the brand’s Fourth of July Sale.

Misen — Use code GOINGFAST15 when you preorder out-of-stock bestsellers and save 15% off.

Sur La Table — Shop editor-loved brands like Le Creuset, All-Clad, and KitchenAid for tableware, knives, countertop appliances, and more. Cookware is up to 40% off, and there’s an extra 20% off clearance.

Lowe’s — You’ll find big holiday savings at Lowe’s, with up to 40% off major appliances, up to 60% off Blink, Ring, and Amazon products, plus 20% off grills and accessories, 40% off outdoor power equipment, patio furniture, accessories, and more. 

Best Buy — There are tons of deals at Best Buy right now, including 50% off select major appliances, plus an extra 20% on qualifying kitchen appliances, TVs, tech, and more.

GIR — Use code BC7DY4 at checkout to save 17% on your order of editor-loved silicone kitchen utensils. Read our review of the 5-Piece Ultimate Tool Set.

Overstock — You’ll find a sale in every single section, including 60% off select mattresses and kitchen essentials starting at $4.

Year & Day — Save 10% on new orders and create a compliment-worthy tablescape.

L’OR Barista — Add this game-changing coffee pod brewer to your cart along with $79 plus in capsules, and you’ll receive another brewer for free. Plus, you can save up to 15% on coffee and espresso capsules. Read our rave review here.

ThermoWorks — Score up to 40% off editor-favorite thermometers and other grilling accessories. Learn why we love the brand’s instant-read thermometers.

BBQ Guys — Get cookout ready with grills, firepits, outdoor furniture, and more up to 60% off.

HSN — You can save on a range of home cleaning and organizing essentials. Just use code HSN2025 to save $10 on your first order.

Click & Grow — Try a new smart garden and get 20% off bundles, plant pods, and accessories.

Plants.com — Search by care, size, amount of light needed, and more, to find the perfect plant for you. The sale section includes orchids and more, up to 25% off.

1-800-Flowers — Refresh your space for the summer with 40% off plants, 2-for-1 blooms, and more seasonal sales.

Target — Save up to 50% on patio furniture and garden accessories, plus deals on home essentials, back-to-school, and more.

Top Cookware Deals

GreenPan — Enjoy up to 50% off editor-loved pans, plus top-of-the-line bakeware, cooking utensils, and countertop appliances. Plus, you’ll get free shipping when you spend more than $125 and a free gift with purchase. Read our review of Green Pan here.

Circulon — Score savings on premium cookware with deals up to 25% off when you spend $350.

Xtrema — Shhh, this is a secret sale and you can save 20% sitewide (plus a secret bonus savings) on the brand’s top-performing nontoxic ceramic cookware. Read our review of the Mini Skillet here.

Lodge — Save up to 25% on Lodge’s iconic cast-iron skillets, baking pans, and more in the sale section. I swear by my cast-iron skillet for eggs, burgers, and more, and so does our contributor in this review.

Biolite — Become the hero of your Fourth of July gathering with a firepit from Biolite. You can save $100 on this smokeless, portable option and read our review, too.

Top Appliance Deals

Frigidaire — For a limited time, you can get up to 35% off plus free installation on fridges, freezers, and ranges. Plus, extra savings on select fridges and ACs.

Hurom — Right now, save up to $90 on select Hurom juicers with code SUMMER2025.

Macy’s — Macy’s is delivering its lowest prices of the summer with up to 70% off countertop appliances, knife sets, cookware, and more. 

Electrolux — In addition to instant rebates, you can save up to 30% off laundry with free installation, plus major savings on vacuum and kitchen appliances. 

A.J. Madison — During the brand’s Fourth of July sale, you can save up to 65% off kitchen appliances and bundles.

Top Food & Grocery Deals

Thrive Market — Save up to 30% off organic and non-GMO groceries and get a free $60 gift.

Spicewalla — Save up to 15% off on flavorful spices sitewide and read our review of the small-batch blends of taco seasoning, jerk seasoning, carne asana rub, and more.

Atlas Coffee Club — Savor coffees from all over the world and get your first bag of coffee for free when you sign up for the Atlas Coffee Club. Plus, you can score $50 off gifts.

D’Artagnan — Score 20% off sitewide on high-quality meat orders of $199 or more. See why our editors named D’Artagnan one of the top online meat purveyors.

Purple Carrot — Plant-based meals that are good for you and the earth? Yes, please. Snag up to 40% off ready-to-eat meals and meal kits, plus free shipping. Read our review of its meal kits.

Try the World —  Save an extra 20% off yummy snacks from around the world using code JOY20.

Top Home & Furniture Deals

West Elm — Score up to 60% off outdoor furniture, plus an extra 20% off clearance and up to 40% off sofas and sectionals. 

Article — Score 40% off hundreds of items like chairs, coffee tables, storage units, and sofa steals under $700. Need some shopping advice?

Ashley — We always find good deals on high-end sofas at Ashley, and now you can take up to 40 percent off select sofas, armchairs, bed frames, sectionals, and outdoor furniture, too.

Kohl’s — I’m always pleasantly surprised by the hidden gems at Kohl’s. Right now there are some epic deals, and you can score up to 70% off in their clearance section. 

Ruggable — Use code FLASH to save 15% on the brand’s bestsellers and more during the sitewide sale. 

Windmill — Take $60 off Windmill’s original in-window air conditioners and $180 off the air purifier, just in time for the summer heat.

Yankee Candle — Stock up on your favorite candles by getting them for 75% off. 

Blinds.com — Give your window treatments an upgrade with discounts of 50% off. Everything is made to fit your exact specifications.

Crate & Barrel — You can get the best deals of the season over at Crate & Barrel’s Warehouse Sale. Save up to 60% on furniture, decor, rugs, and more.

Joss & Main — Create your own outdoor retreat and save up to 30% on outdoor furniture, decor, and more, plus more markdowns in the vast sale section. 

MidInMod — Save up to 70% on mid-century modern pieces you’ll love, from sofas to beds, lighting, and more.

abc carpet & home — The brand’s Fourth of July sale is offering exclusive rug deals up to 60% off, plus major discounts on decor, furniture, and more in the sale section.

Dorai — Shop Dorai kitchen cleaning and organizing bundles and save up to 25% in the brand’s sale section.

W&P — Score some cash off long-lasting nontoxic kitchen storage, drinkware, bundles, and essential tools in the sale section. Our editors love these pieces, including the Ice Ball Box and the Pebble Ice Tray.

BISSELL — Go barefoot this summer with 15% off savings on steam cleaners and powered mops. 

Shark — Take up to 44% off the brand’s vacuums, air purifiers, beauty tools, and more in the sale section.
